definitions.definition: To perform a phlebotomy on (a vein ): to open (a vein) to withdraw or let blood.
To perform a phlebotomy on (a person): to open a vein of (a person) to withdraw or let blood.
To perform a phlebotomy; to open a vein to withdraw or let blood.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To perform a phlebotomy on (a vein ): to open (a vein) to withdraw or let blood.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To perform a phlebotomy on (a person): to open a vein of (a person) to withdraw or let blood.
( intransitive ) To perform a phlebotomy; to open a vein to withdraw or let blood.
